Equally comfortable driving technical implementation and partnering with senior stakeholders to shape analytics roadmaps.

cover_letter.opening: I am writing to express my strong interest in the Senior Data Scientist position at Test Company. With a PhD in Mathematics and over a decade of hands-on experience building and deploying predictive models across life sciences and technology, I am excited by the opportunity to contribute to your team.
body: Throughout my career, I have consistently delivered end-to-end ML solutions — from designing the data architecture and engineering features through to production deployment and ongoing maintenance. At Paradigm, I built a random forest model from scratch that now runs nightly in production, grouping customer quotes into projects using custom text similarity and numerical features. At Redica, I designed a reference data architecture harmonizing data across multiple pharmaceutical clients and built a full suite of risk models implemented in Sigma. These projects required not only strong technical depth but also close collaboration with stakeholders at every level.

I am particularly drawn to Test Company's mission and the opportunity to work at the intersection of advanced analytics and real business impact. My background spans both the hands-on modeling work and the strategic side — I have led teams, partnered with senior leadership, and presented at industry conferences — and I am equally comfortable in either mode depending on what the role demands.
cover_letter.closing: I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with what you are looking for. Thank you for your time and consideration.
